pullRequest.title: Upgrade checkout action to v2 to fix "fatal: reference is not a tree" issue
pullRequest.bodyText: By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

nodes.bodyText:
I think we are moving away from openssl and using java ssl.
@debjanibnrj what is the openssl status?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,24 +12,39 @@ on:
 jobs:
   build:
     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
-    container: opendistroforelasticsearch/security-maven:v1
 
     steps:
 
+    - name: Set up JDK 11
+      uses: actions/setup-java@v1
+      with:
+        java-version: 11.0.x
+
     - name: Checkout security
-      uses: actions/checkout@v1
+      uses: actions/checkout@v2
 
     - name: Checkstyle
       run: mvn checkstyle:checkstyle
-      
+
+    - name: prepare openssl

nodes.bodyText: Also the workflow runs on Ubuntu image. Can we not directly use openssl and set OPENDISTRO_SECURITY_TEST_OPENSSL_OPT=true for the test ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,24 +12,39 @@ on:
 jobs:
   build:
     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
-    container: opendistroforelasticsearch/security-maven:v1
 
     steps:
 
+    - name: Set up JDK 11
+      uses: actions/setup-java@v1
+      with:
+        java-version: 11.0.x
+
     - name: Checkout security
-      uses: actions/checkout@v1
+      uses: actions/checkout@v2
 
     - name: Checkstyle
       run: mvn checkstyle:checkstyle
-      
+
+    - name: prepare openssl
+      run: |
+        mkdir -p tmp/build-openssl && cd tmp/build-openssl
+        curl -OL https://ftp.openssl.org/source/openssl-1.0.1u.tar.gz

commit.message: Upgrade checkout action to v2 to fix "fatal: reference is not a tree" issue

afterCommit.message: Upgrade checkout action to v2 to fix "fatal: reference is not a tree" issue
